alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 29 at 3:18PM EDT until October 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach County, Coastal Broward County and Coastal Miami Dade County. * WHEN...For the High Rip Current Risk, through Monday evening. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 2 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County
